grid.expression: SELECT CAB.AD_PEDORIGINAL AS PEDIDO_ORIGINAL, FL.NUNOTA, FL.DATA, VEN.APELIDO AS RESPONSAVEL, R.VLRFRETE, MOT.MOTIVOBONIFICADO, ISNULL(SUM(sankhya.PRECODECUSTO(ITE.CODPROD, ITE.CODVOL)*QTDNEG),0) AS custo FROM sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIO R WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOFLUXO FL WITH (NOLOCK) ON FL.ORDERID = R.ORDERID AND FL.CODREENVIO = R.CODREENVIO INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) ON CAB.NUNOTA = FL.NUNOTA INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFVEN VEN WITH (NOLOCK) ON VEN.CODVEND = CAB.CODVEND LEFT JOIN sankhya.AD_MOTIVOBONIFICADO MOT WITH (NOLOCK) ON MOT.CODMOTBONI = CAB.AD_CODMOTBONI INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFITE ITE WITH (NOLOCK) ON ITE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA WHERE FL.DATA BETWEEN :DTINI AND :DTFIM AND FL.OCORRENCIA = 'P' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sankhya.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSCREENVIOFLUXO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE OCORRENCIA IN ('C') AND ORDERID = R.ORDERID AND CODREENVIO = R.CODREENVIO) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sankhya.TGFITE ITE WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) ON PRO.CODPROD = ITE.CODPROD WHERE NUNOTA = FL.NUNOTA AND CODGRUPOPROD BETWEEN 500000 AND 599999) GROUP BY CAB.AD_PEDORIGINAL,FL.NUNOTA, FL.DATA, VEN.APELIDO, R.VLRFRETE, MOT.MOTIVOBONIFICADO
